PixworldAdventure.gettingthere: Getting There         This tour starts and ends in Nairobi          Book your own international flights when using this operator help          Fly to/from Jomo Kenyatta Airport (NBO- Check price) in Nairobi          A transfer from and back to the airport is included          Additional accommodation before and at the end of the tour can be arranged for an extra cost
